Key Match Events: Croatia equalized just four minutes after falling behind
Andre Kramaric equalized from close range in the 70th minute
Scotland nearly scored in the last kick of the game but it was ruled offside
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Modric praised for his performance and impact on the game
Croatia secured all three points and now have six points from their first three games in the group
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zlatko Dalic’s side completed a comeback win
Modric captained the side and was impactful throughout the game
Croatia registered 11 shots to Scotland’s four in the second half
